name: Stony Fang
effects: Four single attacks (0.14 each), multiplier increases with user's ATK
effectsNote:
The multiplier per hit for this attack is given by the following formula:

(1+min((1/(1+exp(-ATK/1000*3.2))*2-1)*4;3.66))*0.14

It has a minimum of 0.14x and caps at 0.65x at around 977 ATK.

name: Onyx Wave
effects: Four single attacks (0.54 each), ATK increases as HP decreases
effectsNote:
This ability essentially works like a normal physical attack, but acts as if the user had the following value added to their ATK:

(1-(2/(1+EXP(-1*HP%* 8))-1))*1500

The maximum ATK bonus (ideally reached at 0% HP) is +1500.

name: Icy Revenge
effects: Four single attacks (0.54 each), ATK increases as HP decreases
effectsNote:
This ability essentially works like a normal physical attack, but acts as if the user had the following value added to their ATK:

(1-(2/(1+EXP(-1*HP%* 8))-1))*1500

The maximum ATK bonus (ideally reached at 0% HP) is +1500.
